website_summaries.verdict: Case that is comfortable, rugged, and easy to install or remove.
pros: The best protection for your Switch can be found with this Mumba cover
Customers love this cover for its comfortable feel and overall protection
This case covers the Switch as well as the Joy-Cons
Some customers think it improves the feel and look of the Switch
Designed to fit inside the Mumbo Switch Carry Case
cons: The clear back is made of a different material that doesn't feel as nice as the rubberized areas

customer_reviews.title: Great but a few notes...
customer_reviews.text: I don't only like that it looks great, but the grip adds a nice feeling and touch. The only con for me is that if you are someone who constantly detach the joy-cons to play, you will need to take the cover off. For someone like me who leave them attached and use pro controller, there's no problem at all. It protects it very well. Note that you'll need the extender cable for the stand because it won't fit in it either unless you take of the cover. The extender cable is a must even if you do not buy a cover because there have been reports of scratches on the screen while docking and un-docking the switch.
customer_reviews.author: Raul Vazquez

customer_reviews.title: Warning! Use a skin when using this product
customer_reviews.text: Warning! Buy a decal for switch and then use this case because it will damage the switch cosmetic wise. I wanted to keep my switch in pristine condition but that's not happening anymore
customer_reviews.author: slikvic

customer_reviews.title: Removing the case causes the Joy Con controllers to break!
customer_reviews.text: Thought this product was a must have but you have to take the case off in order to play it on the tv. The more you take the case off the more pressure is put on the controllers. It causes stress on the tiny screws holding it together and it has caused both of our joy con controllers to break. Quite expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Kiki

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put on. The edges are flexible so you can put it on safe and off. It's perfect in my hands. Looks amazing .i was worry it will damage my switch because of that 1 review on here. Idk how that one review broke off a piece of his switch.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Villarreal

customer_reviews.title: Got this for my kid's Switch. Since the kid ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my kid's Switch. Since the kid is a kid, they drop stuff. All. The. Time. I was therefore scared of getting them a $300 portable video game machine, and my kid can't sit down to do ANYTHING. Stands up and walks around while doing everything. So a kid with an expensive machine, walking around constantly, not looking where they're going is a recipe for dropping and breaking said machine. Kid has dropped it on carpet and hardwood floors and down the stairs. It didn't break. In fact, that machine still works perfectly. I call this case a winner.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Great and Very Uncomfortable Protection
customer_reviews.text: The protection aspect is top notch and can still be used when transporting your Switch if you don't have another case of some kind. But it's crazy uncomfortable, so much so that it actually turns me off from playing in handheld mode. Accidentally dropped the Switch while this cover was on and it definitely protected the unit. Only a few feet, but still. Comfy it is not. Tough it certainly is. Were the return window not closed, however, I would be sending it back. Good for 30 minutes or so before hand pain tops. Repeatedly putting it on and taking it off scratched up my joycons, too. So there's that
customer_reviews.author: Andrew J. Holland

customer_reviews.title: Greats protection - Not for long sessions
customer_reviews.text: SHIPPING Product arrived in time. PACKAGING & MATERIALS The box is well protected, the material is a hard plastic, which feel of an excellent quality. Fortunately, it has helped me to maintain it without any damage (I have already dropped the nintendo a couple of times). ASSEMBLY & USE Place the nintendo switch, remove the protector is very simple and fast, it does not take more than 20 seconds. I only use it for short game sessions because using it for long periods causes my hands to cramp (which is why they are 4 stars). CONCLUSIONS A protector that will definitely help maintain the nintendo without damage and that I recommend using for short game sessions.
customer_reviews.author: Jesús Parra

customer_reviews.title: An "Otterbox" style case for your Switch
customer_reviews.text: Definitely the durable case I was looking for. It was the only case that had the aesthetic design i liked with the feel i wanted too. If you decide to get a DBrand skin for your joycons, do be careful that it does not attempt to remove the top part of the vinyl when removing from the case. It has a large enough cutout for any aftermarket USB type-C ports you may have. And will be fine on a foldable stand you may have. The fitment into any case was a concern of mine, but was pleasantly surprised when I found out it was a perfect fit into my carrying case.
customer_reviews.author: TheDrawingMil

customer_reviews.title: Really strong and protective case for your Switch.
customer_reviews.text: Really protective and comfortable case for your switch. This is the closest thing to an otterbox you can get for your Nintendo Switch. It is especially strong at the place where the joycons attach to the rails of the Switch. I highly recommend this to anyone who is prone to accidental drops or just wants a little extra safeguarding for when they are on the go. I also recommend the carrying case made by Mumba, which I also have. With both of the these cases together, you could drop your switch down a flight of concrete stairs and it would survive the impact, no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel R

customer_reviews.title: It will chip and crack your switch
customer_reviews.text: First off it looks and feels great, but after 4 or 5 times of putting the switch in and out it took a look at the area near the top of my switch I noticed chipping. Then I turn the system around and notice a small hairline crack heading towards the screw. Needs to be loosened up on specs on the case it puts too much pressure and stress on the plastic
customer_reviews.author: W.Nemethvargo

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel, compact enough to fit in most cases but not the dock
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great for travel. Decent grip without being too big to fit in most cases. It will not fit into the dock. Feels like it would protect the Switch if dropped, though I'd rather not test it and update this review. It fits really well, maybe almost too well as the removal of the case feels like I'm peeling it off rather hard. Would not recommend putting it on and taking it off every day. I would love for it to fit in the dock or have a stand, but that's not a dealbreaker. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Bill E.

customer_reviews.title: Just as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Overall this is a great case for the price, I like that the corners are raised to protect the screen from impact if it was to fall. The case doesn't feel overly bulky or uncomfortable for the most part. There are a few things that could've been done differently in my opinion though, the case is just a bit to large for the dock, but I kinda expected that it wouldn't fit, also the case is very rigid and the edges that flip over the front of the switch are in just the right places to grab a joycon and damage the slide it connects to if you aren't careful.
customer_reviews.author: RTNavyVet

customer_reviews.title: Pain to take off
customer_reviews.text: Feels like you're going to brake the Joycons while attempting to pull out the switch from this case. Very sturdy, but not worth it if you're going to dock it or use the Joycons. Should be easier to remove without having to yank on it so hard.
customer_reviews.author: AMZN Addict

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: This looks complicated to apply, but its really easy. Many comments complained that they broke pieces off their console. I can see why, bc they're not applying it as directed. Never use the joy sticks to put pressure. Using the joy stick to make the cover go on is a no no! Make sure you're pulling from the corner where the directions say to pull. The cover itself is very firm, it can hold up to falls! I like it a lot. This console is expensive you want to protect it as much as possible. Don't hesitate to buy. It's worth the buy! The colors are as described.
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Tight, low profile fit.
customer_reviews.text: The case fits VERY snug, almost a little too tight when you're needing to remove the case after. Take care when separating the case from the Switch and I've found it more successful to start popping the bottom edges over the Joy-Con's off first. The tight fit is nice though and feels very sturdy with no loose points and the case is very minimal without adding too much extra size to the switch. The case however does not increase much for grip, so if you've got medium/large hands then this likely won't be very comfortable to hold for extended periods of time. This case also will not fit into the Switch dock, so you'll have to attach/remove it every time.
customer_reviews.author: TheWalkin

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I like this product. I know there’s a lot of different grip-cases for the Switch and several of them have pretty good reviews. However, I bought this one to go with the Mumba carrying case and I’m quite happy with both. The grip/case fits *almost* perfectly in the carrying case. Both are quality products. No complaints whatsoever. The Mumba grip/case (this product) *does* bow outwards at the top where the Joy Cons attach to the Switch body a TINY bit but I feel like the case is just helping to keep everything secure. A solid purchase. P.S. THE CASE IS NOT HARD TO TAKE OFF LIKE OTHERS HAVE COMPLAINED. P.S.S. These vendors need to work on their English skills.
customer_reviews.author: ams911

customer_reviews.title: Fits like a glove
customer_reviews.text: I'm going on a 4-day trip with wife and son and I'll be bringing the Switch to keep my toddler entertained. I thought I better get a case just to be safe. It just arrived and it fits like a glove. My 3.5 y/o was really excited even though it's just a case. It fit like a glove, in and out. He appreciated the texture and see through window. It didn't really add on much weight as well because he didn't complain, so far. I will update on its durability after my upcoming trip. If you find this review helpful, please click 'helpful' button at the end of this product review. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: CTN412

customer_reviews.title: Simple, effective
customer_reviews.text: Overall, this is a great case for anyone who wants serious protection for their Switch. I would recommend this for anyone who uses their Switch in handheld mode (with the joycons attached) for significant periods of time and/or travel with it. I would not recommend it for anyone who primarily uses their Switch while docked and/or never travels with it. This case will NOT fit in most carrying cases and will also add some significant size and weight to the Switch. However, it will provide protection similar to Otter cases for phones and will actually make your Switch easier to hold in handheld mode.
customer_reviews.author: Sean C

customer_reviews.title: Great function, better grip. No kickstand support.
customer_reviews.text: I love this case! It's built tough yet, flexible enough to take insert/remove the Switch. Only two things I dislike.... There is no "cutout" for the kickstand, so no freestanding system. The other issue is that it is too big to place the Switch in its dock. This is a given though. I can't fault Mumba for this. Adding ANY extra bulk would prevent the Switch fitting in the dock. Overall though I like it, I like that it adds a little bulk for easier holding. (I feel the Switch on its own is too thin and causes hand cramps). Great job, Mumba!!
customer_reviews.author: htcnonsense

customer_reviews.title: Very well-made and durable
customer_reviews.text: Received this case today, so I can’t speak yet for how it holds up, but it is great quality and feels very durable. I expect it to offer the needed protection for my 6 year olds new Switch. I do wish you could remove the joy-cons without having to take the entire case off, but I knew this wasn’t possible from reading other reviews. Overall, this case is exactly what we wanted and both myself and my son agree that it makes the console more comfortable to hold.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Feltner

customer_reviews.title: Best for if you don’t use the dock often!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this case daily almost for a few months now and I don’t have a desire to replace it. The grips are low profile enough to fit into a standard soft-body Switch case, but not my hard-bodied aluminum HORI case. It is comfortable to hold and keeps the joycon secure. I always felt like the joycons are wobbly in the back and forth direction and I fear that one intense game too many will snap the slider connection, but not with this case! My main gripe: The kickstand is inaccessible and you have to remove the case for any unmodified docks. Plus, it can be tough to get off and on.
customer_reviews.author: reefswimmer

customer_reviews.title: Slim, strong, comfy, but not ergonomic.
customer_reviews.text: I got this case because nearly every list on the internet recommended it, and everyone who has ever praised it is pretty much right. I recommend it due to the durability, how slim it is compared to other cases I've seen, and the grip. My only downfall is in the grip, however. While it's great in providing a textured grip with a small curve on the back, I expected to be able to comfortable hold this while laying in bed or reclined in a chair. It definitely is easier to hold yet my hands still cramp up after around half an hour of repetitive play. The grip design simply is comfortable but not ergonomic.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Great if you game on the go
customer_reviews.text: A lot of reviews said this was easy to pull on and off, that even their kids do it. It felt like I was going to snap off the remotes on the side with this case, After a few times, I realize that either I got a super tough one, or I'm to protective over my switch, With that said, this thing is tough, and you can knock someone out with it if you really wanted to. It feels like a cell phone case on steroids. I'm choosing to return this because I don't intend to game on the go, just wanted something comfortable to just remove from the dock and sit on the bed from time to time.
customer_reviews.author: Rpg

customer_reviews.title: Overheats the Nintendo Switch
customer_reviews.text: Pro's: Easy to install. Fits in our children's every day case. Con's: The bumpers really do not protect the corners; they require more padding. Hard to install, kids cannot do it on their own. MAJOR FLAW, system impedes adequate air flow and the Nintendo Switch overheats After playing for 40 minutes the cover has to be removed because the component becomes very hot.
customer_reviews.author: mdawsondae

customer_reviews.title: Great case with only one downside
customer_reviews.text: This case is great and is slim enough to fit in most larger hardshell cases for front protection (like the zelda breath of the wild shieka slate case, or fun lab's snorlax carrying case) this case makes it easier to hold and you do feel as if it is protected. Putting on is easy but taking it off...sheesh, gotta be careful not the easist to take off and i can believe possibly the pressure it takes to take off may damage it if not careful. My advice is to take your time when taking off and on, and you should be ok. Overall great amazing case and would reccomend.
customer_reviews.author: Adam B

customer_reviews.title: This case fits like a glove
customer_reviews.text: This case fits like a glove. Adds a nice level of sturdy grip to the console. Looks good with the neon red & blue joy-cons plus green stick caps. The only thing that I think needs to be a little better, is the game card slot. It is a bit tight with the card cover. I will manage though. ..
customer_reviews.author: ShinMadman3rd

customer_reviews.title: Used with a 5 Year Old
customer_reviews.text: Provides enough protection for my 5 year old. He hasn't really dropped the Switch in the year we've had it. But, I feel like this would offer enough protection for a spill. He's so short that it wouldn't fall far anyway. It's also easy enough to install and take off. He can pull the switch from the dock himself and install the case by himself. He's responsible enough to do that everytime. But, I have to help remove the case and get it back into the dock. The switch goes in and out of the case daily for the last few months and it has held up to that.
customer_reviews.author: Bob 🎮💻

customer_reviews.title: Great Case
customer_reviews.text: This case is very solid and very qood quality. It fits well and looks like its going to protect the switch. Not too bulky and is easy to hold. The loss of a star comes from taking the case off. Putting it on was easy, but taking it off was not as easy. Even following the instructions, it was not easy. You cannot use this case while the switch is docked, but that doesn't bother me as this case will be used for traveling. If you are looking for something that will protect your switch, get this! You won't be disappointed. Its better than those plastic cases by far.
customer_reviews.author: H. Bokor

customer_reviews.title: Great product but a little tricky to attach and remove
customer_reviews.text: This case is really sturdy and feel good to hold when I'm using the Switch since the controllers are smaller and less ergonomic than full-sized versions. I haven't dropped it yet with the case on, but I expect it will protect my Switch well because of its thick, durable material. Only reason I'm not giving a full 5 stars is that it can be a little tricky to attach and remove, even with the instructions. I'm afraid to apply too much pressure for fear of breaking the case or the Switch, so it takes a few careful moments longer than necessary. A good value though.
customer_reviews.author: Jan G.

customer_reviews.title: Solid durable case for kids
customer_reviews.text: It's a really nice solid case I read some of the reviews about it being hard to take off and put on it was no problem for me the switch fits in there nice and snug not lose it's what anybody should want it's not a problem for me putting it in because I have big hands and no problem bending the top part down I guess a kid would have a tough time with it or somebody with small delicate hands overall nice case real sturdy and colorful my 8 year old likes it
customer_reviews.author: dmirror

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and durable
customer_reviews.text: This case is very comfortable and of good quality. I feel as though the tops of my joy cons are a bit exposed and would not be well protected if dropped, but I'm confident it will protect the rest of my Switch very well! I love the bright green color, too, looks great!! I tried a case with separate protectors for my joy cons. My son dropped it and one of the joy cons snapped off... which led me to buy a one piece protective case this time! I feel my Switch is much more protected now!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: This case gives you the most protection for you Switch.
customer_reviews.text: Well this case gives you extra weight to the switch. You can feel it when you hold it in your hand, which might give you hand fatigue during long handheld sessions. It's okay to put it in but very hard to take it out, especially when you want to dock the switch. Not really interested so I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Hoan Le

customer_reviews.title: Buy this!  Protection is a must.
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly! Buy it...NOW! My daughter dropped he Switch and the joy-con broke off...ugh. After fixing it, I purchased this and now I feel its secure now. Wish I would have known about these sooner. Dont forget about a screen protector. In order to charge her Switch, I just plug it into my Samsung Note9 charging cable. We dont use the charging dock anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Momof5

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, tight fitting very protective case !
customer_reviews.text: Very strong case compared to others I have purchased. It fits very tight to the switch so getting it off is a pain, but as long as your not one wanting to constantly take off the joy cons the case is great ! Regardless even if you do take them off the case is worth the hassle of taking it off to simply protect the system ! The packaging was messed up when I recieved it as they sent it in a thin package yet still the case was in great condition!
customer_reviews.author: Jessa0411

customer_reviews.title: Hard to Remove
customer_reviews.text: If you can get the thing on, it's comfortable to hold. It looks nice, which means nothing. Taking it off is pain, so if you switch between hand-held and docked often, it's a chore. I don't recommend it. I'm actually worried it's causing more stress and harm to my switch than it is protecting it. The problem could be solved by making the top part of the case removable, or by having it hinge. Having to bend the rigid plastic material is not smart design.
customer_reviews.author: David P.

customer_reviews.title: Tough, Effective, and Cool-Looking
customer_reviews.text: I love this! It fits your hands better than the Switch on its own does FOR SURE. It feels like a controller with this case. That was a bonus for me because I only bought it for physical protection. I can be confident playing in handheld mode on the go and not stressing about dropping it. Plus it would be harder to drop because now its so much easier to hold. And at first I thought it looked funky, heck no. This looks rugged and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Chadillac

customer_reviews.title: Great case except for removeing
customer_reviews.text: The case looks very nice and I am happy for my purchase. Although the Switch will not fit in the Dock with this case on. I'm not worried about that, as I have a stand for the Switch. One thing I can say for this case is, it is a little difficult to remove the case once it is on and you need to get to the joy-con controllers.
customer_reviews.author: forcie270

customer_reviews.title: Nice Starter Case
customer_reviews.text: I needed a case that would make the Nintendo Switch feel more stable in while playing. I feel like I could break off the joycons or break the switch. Although designed will, it does feel a little rickety during daily use. I like this case because it's one piece and travels well. I particularly like that it fits perfectly in my Nintendo Switch case. This will not fit in the dock, but when I travel I don't take the dock with me. I think this case is a good fit for my particular use and a solid product.
customer_reviews.author: Joe L.

customer_reviews.title: AAAA+++++ Protective Case
customer_reviews.text: Great protective Nintendo Switch Case fits very nice and snug and the bottom egornomics feels very comfortable playing in portable mode feels way better to grip and my hands don’t cramp after long periods of gameplay great strong rubber material feels like it will last a very long time this review is for the Rugged Mumba Case only! This case will not fit the docked Mode all I did was use the the c type power adapter and plug that into the bottom of the switch to charge the system you must take the Mumba Case off if you want to play in dock mode with a tv!
customer_reviews.author: CJ1605

customer_reviews.title: Grandson likes it!
customer_reviews.text: My 8-year-old grandson bought this with his own money, and is liking it. I definitely like that I feel like the Switch is better protected now. It's a little tricky for him to put on and take off, and the Switch doesn't fit into the charger with the case on. But other than that, no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Cody C

customer_reviews.title: Substantial and working great!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice case, substantial, looks and feels great. I would buy this again, it has really held up and I dont mind taking it off when I want to play on the TV. You can charge the Switch with a USB C while this case is on and only need to take it off so it will fit in the TV dock. For me it was easy to remove if you go slow, while holding like you are going to play something, starting at the top, push the cover off with your thumbs, then move to the sides and do the same, it pops right off.
customer_reviews.author: TechNoNerd

customer_reviews.title: It’s just perfect.
customer_reviews.text: People that complains about this product certainly don’t know what they’re doing. If you read the instructions it clearly explains how to install it/remove it. The edges are made of rubber, totally harmless to the switch, no scratches, etc. Charging port is accessible and the cartridge port as well. It does not fit on the base (was not designed for that), micro SD is not accesible neither, nor the stand. Overall is great and it accomplishes it’s intended purpose. Quality and grip feels great. Totally recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: CR

customer_reviews.title: Great case for Switch
customer_reviews.text: Great case for Switch. Very comfortable to hold while playing in handheld mode. Easy to install and remove. Not a complaint, but know that you cannot use dock with this case. Have to remove the case to dock or to remove controllers or use kickstand. Not a big beal since its easy to remove. You are still able to charge with power cable directly while case is on. Offers great protection all the way around except top corners which are exposed. But I think that the most crucial parts are well protected. Case adds good grip to consule.
customer_reviews.author: Greg & Sandra Malinao

customer_reviews.title: Great Protection
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 6 year old to keep his switch safe. Fits perfect and provides awesome protection (almost like an otter box commuter). It is a little difficult and a pain (because they always ask me) removing the case every time they want to put the joysticks into a controller. We bought the amFilm Tempered Glass Screen Protector for Nintendo Switch 2017 (2-Pack)” for screen protection and it works/fits perfectly with this case.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Nice case!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty awesome, makes the switch feel more sturdy than without one. I saw other reviews that it was hard to install, it was pretty simple and straightforward. Adds a little bit of weight but I feel like that it adds to the overall sturdy feel. You cannot dock it with it on it and you can’t plug in a wireless adapter with the case on. The latter is my biggest beef with it but I bought an extender.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Hands are no longer numb.
customer_reviews.text: I hate the Switch. It’s very uncomfortable. My hand cramps up after a couple minutes. I bought the Mumba case. I love my Switch. It’s ergonomic. It doesn’t feel like I’m gonna bend the joycons off and break my Switch. This is the best case for the switch. Though I only play my Switch in handheld mode i must state it’s a pain to get off of you wanna use it in the dock.
customer_reviews.author: KmyJelly

customer_reviews.title: Almost grips too much
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and strong case However, it almost grips so hard that when trying to take it off I fear that I’m damaging my console. Bothers me just about every time I pull it off the console. Which, if you use it for a home console and handled regularly then you’ll find yourself taking it in and out a lot. If you want to keep it on for long periods of time and rarely take it out then it’s a great case! But beware possible damage over time from a very strong grip when taking the switch out.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Great cover for my Switch!
customer_reviews.text: This case works great! It is easy to put on and take off, which is important if you want to use the JoyCons separately or want to put it in the tv cradle. I keep this case on most of the time, it is thin enough fit in the Nintendo Switch Game Traveler Deluxe Travel Case- Zelda Breath of the Wild - Sheikah Eye case perfectly (although tight). Feels good in my hands while playing games. I have large hands and appreciate the thicker feel of the game system when using this cover.
customer_reviews.author: Lodi601

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel and protection
customer_reviews.text: Been using this case for over a year. I use my switch in the mobile version 24/7 so this works well for me. When I remove the case to clean the Switch, it comes off with relative ease. Feels great and makes the Switch feel a bit more study.
customer_reviews.author: John Kettering

customer_reviews.title: Perfect case for Toddler control
customer_reviews.text: I bought this case because my toddler has decided the Switch goes with us everywhere. She's got the bad gamer habit of tossing it when she frustrated. Really sturdy feeling. Comfortable. Easy to hold. As long as you take the top corners off first it comes out easy. Pair it with a nice screen protector and you're good to go! Can't access the kick stand or place it in the console but I rarely use either anyways. Love the Mumba case and would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Amazing case that's difficult to remove
customer_reviews.text: I love the durability and protective capabilities of this case, but the case is difficult to remove. It isn't necessarily difficult as in physically hard, but it is difficult to remove without the fear that the grip of the case would damage your switch if removed incorrectly or slightly too hard. I've had it for a while now and it feels tanky and makes me feel comfortable to take it on the go. I would give this a 5/5 but the "easy to remove" aspect is a 3/5 for me.
customer_reviews.author: Adventure Donut

customer_reviews.title: Solid with a great grip feel
customer_reviews.text: Nice opaque color makes it stylish and hard to lose. The plastic is textured just enough. It gives you a firm grip, without fear it will slipping off your desk or out of your hands. Now, it just needs to be available in "Twitch" purple.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon User

customer_reviews.title: sturdy, well built
customer_reviews.text: Strong, sturdy, well built. For a gamer like me who has arthritis, this case serves as an excellent grip extension for a handheld that (honestly) can become difficult to play for extended periods of time without the extra grip. The material feels great in the hand, almost as though it were a natural addition to the console. And the grip isn't difficult to remove if you follow the instructions provided. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Magician

customer_reviews.title: Average product
customer_reviews.text: This product does not have a screen protector which is disappointing however it appears to be able to protect the machine itself. You have to take it off every single time you want to charge the device. It is hard to as my 8 year old couldn’t do it and it is his and my 19 year old had a hard time
customer_reviews.author: Candyce C. Peay

customer_reviews.title: Great case!
customer_reviews.text: This was one of the most recommended and highest rated cases on amazon for the Nintendo switch. I did research before I bought one to make sure I was getting the best protection for my nephews Switch. The case looks great and does the job well. Make sure you get a carrying case that can fit the Mumba case if you are taking it anywhere since it is a little bigger than most cases. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron B.

customer_reviews.title: Great Case, but not perfect.
customer_reviews.text: It's definitely a good case if you're looking for something to protect the switch, however for me it falls short of a couple of key components. - Installing is a little touch, and trying to take it out is equally challenging. While it does keep it protected, I have to fight to take it off. - Power/Volume buttons aren't as receptive as it doesn't fit snug on those buttons. I find myself trying a bit too much to turn on and to adjust volume. - I have smaller hands, so it's a little challenging grasping the switch with it on and being able to play. Other than what I noted, it's a great case and definitely worth getting!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Feels super safe
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing, I have had it for about 6months now I use handheld like 95% of the time that's why I got this case and even if I want to use docked it's easy to take odff all you need to do is follow the directions and even amazing has like a 30sec video to show you how, all the bad reviews are peoole not following directions.
customer_reviews.author: James Steven Hurt

customer_reviews.title: Great, solid case for the Nintendo Switch
customer_reviews.text: We just got our Nintendo Switch and wanted to make sure it stays in good condition, so they is a must-buy in my opinion. Honestly, for the price, I was very surprised at how well this case is constructed, the packaging, etc. It snaps onto the Switch with ease and is very comfortable to hold during extended game play. The case does not block any of the ports for connectivity, game slot, or even the vent for cooling. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Justin D. Kendall

customer_reviews.title: Heavy!?
customer_reviews.text: Pros: -Makes my switch feel safe and secure. -Keeps my Joy-Cons in place, I tend to accidentally disengage them easily when swapping game carts. Cons: -Heavy. Really feels like it's doubling my Switch's weight. I'm a big man, moderately in shape, but darn, my wrists and nerves are prone to carpel tunnel issues / pins/needles and the weight of this case, I really feel it makes it too heavy. I can't confirm any case scratching as others have mentioned. And so far my Joy Cons are not loose due to removing case a few times. I'm considering not using it anymore, mostly all due to the weight. Maybe I'm just being a baby.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Naujunas

customer_reviews.title: Loved this case, highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Loved this case. Unfortunately with my larger hands I have found I’m unable to play the switch with the joycons attached to the switch at all. This added welcome bulk to the switch, along with extra comfort, but the small/tight angle I have to hold my hands just doesn’t work for me period. Easy to get on/off but not loose and will def not slip off. Highly recommend. Fits perfectly inside the orzly carry case.
customer_reviews.author: Craig W.

customer_reviews.title: Easy on and off!
customer_reviews.text: I was worried when I read the reviews about the switch breaking when you try to take it off, but that's not the "case." It's easily removed when you need to. My kids have yet to drop it (that I know of,) so I can't speak to that, but the design makes it easier to grasp. The only reason I rated it a 4 is because you have to remove it to charge it.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Protects a Nintendo switch
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my boys who are 7, who received Nintendo switch for Xmas. Was worried they are not so careful with hand held devices. Turns out I was right. These are great quality and really protect the devices. I can tell they have dropped them quite a few times and no damage. I highly recommend these. Also it’s easier for them to hold being in the protector
customer_reviews.author: Aileen M. Sawyer

customer_reviews.title: Great case maybe a little too much
customer_reviews.text: The case adds some weight to the switch. Which makes it much more comfortable to hold. Feels like it's very protective. And it's easy to take off and on. I love it alot! Edit-2020- It's breaking my switch. Took some pieces off from the vent and the side. The case is really really protective. But it fits so tight that their isn't a easy way to get the switch out of it. I don't recommend
customer_reviews.author: D shady

customer_reviews.title: Great case
customer_reviews.text: I bought this along with the travel case and they work great together. You can keep the system in this case and put it in the travel case for added protection. If you are looking for something to keep your system safe from dropping, I highly recommend buying this case along with the Carrying Case also made by Mumba.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette

customer_reviews.title: High quality and a must have for any Switch
customer_reviews.text: This product is very high quality. I have owned this well over a year now and it still looks new. It has protected my switch from many drops. It is easy to remove to put in and out of the dock, but I wish it was designed to stay on while in the dock.
customer_reviews.author: CS Programmer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I love this case. Easy to put on and take off when you want to dock your switch. The comfort grips on the back let me play for hours without getting hand cramps and gives you that traction so your switch doesn’t fly out of your hands. Perfect, strong sturdy case. It even fits in the butterfox hard carrying case with the Mumba case on my switch.
customer_reviews.author: mindyury

customer_reviews.title: Like an OtterBox for your Switch
customer_reviews.text: I compare this to an OtterBox phone case (haven’t dropped my switch with the case on yet, cannot speak on its actual protection) because it’s the perfect comparison in terms of texture. This case adds grip, weight, and size to the switch, and makes it, to me at least, feel more like a console when used as a handheld. However, if you consider yourself to have small hands or don’t like a bulky case, I do NOT recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Extra protection for your switch
customer_reviews.text: After spending more money on a new game console, I like to know it’s being protected. We bought the switch and although I love that the kids can take it all around the house I also don’t like that they can take it all over the house. I am constantly worried that they are going to drop it. This case gives me a little more peace of mind. Although we haven’t seen it dropped too far yet (thank goodness) it has tumbled from my four year old’s hands a couple of times and this case has protected it from the fall.
customer_reviews.author: Rabblerouser

customer_reviews.title: Really Good Back Case Cover for the Switch.
customer_reviews.text: This case looks and feels great on the Switch. It is easy to get on and off after a few times until you get used to how it works and it is broke in a bit. But trust me, easy, my 6 year old son now does it his self. I wish the switch would fit in the docking station with this cover on but it does not however this hasn't been a big deal for us since this case really only goes on when we take his Switch out of the house. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Chucker B

customer_reviews.title: Good quality case.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good quality case, it seems sturdy and durable, the Nintendo switch fits very good, and you can access the bottoms well, the only thing, is that it’s hard to remove the Joy cons, you have to remove the whole case to do that. Not a big deal, but because the case it’s made sturdy and is made of a good quality plastic it’s hard to remove it every time you want to remove Joy Cons. But I believe this is a problem that will happen with any case. Overall very happy with the case.
customer_reviews.author: Angie777

customer_reviews.title: Super nice case
customer_reviews.text: Love this case, the material is sturdy as heck, feels nice, and my switch sits nice and secure in it. The only small complaint I have is that it is a bit complicated to get it in and out, which isn't a problem because I don't dock it very often.
customer_reviews.author: Jazz

customer_reviews.title: Good protection - but requires removal for playing on the TV
customer_reviews.text: Like the durability of this case; it's not super convenient if you're using the controllers though. Then you have to take them out of the case each time and though it's not difficult, it's not as easy as it looks, either.
customer_reviews.author: Jessika Whiteside

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Case is sturdy and nice, feels good in the hands. The only downside is it is took big to put in your typical Switch cover case. It also doesn't allow you put it in the dock without taking it out of the case. Works great if your only going to be using it as a hand held. Maybe just look at other options if you plan to take it back and forth from the dock to the hands often.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb

customer_reviews.title: Great item!
customer_reviews.text: Great case. Heavy duty and fall proof THANK GOD!! I don’t know what else to say other then my son has dropped his switch several times and if it wasn’t for this case his switch would of been broken by now. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Faith

customer_reviews.title: It's Great! Makes the Switch Better to Hold!
customer_reviews.text: I love this case! It's durable and nice to hold in your hands. I always found that holding the Switch naked was awkward, and also my hands would get sweaty as I played and I didn't like getting my Switch all sweaty. So this case works wonderfully because it makes the Switch more comfortable to hold and keeps my Switch from getting all sweaty! I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Katy

customer_reviews.title: love the quality and the way it looks
customer_reviews.text: love the quality and the way it looks. it is a well made item for your switch. this will protect it very well. my son took it with him to canada and let me tell you my son is very cafeful with his electronics so i cannot say i bought for that i just got it to make sure or to avoid an accident. the feel is really good. the grip is supurb. so no complaints here. and it is very nice to look at not that matters.
customer_reviews.author: Hello Kitty Mom of 4

customer_reviews.title: Great Case very strong!!!
customer_reviews.text: After a several months of using this product its safe to my Nintendo Switch is still alive and kicking. Great Product, awesome color and just the right amount of bulk and weight. Its easy to slip on and off when needed, Thanks for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Lee A. Schlanger

customer_reviews.title: A must have for hand held mode!
customer_reviews.text: So I got a cat that likes to bite and nibble suff I also have Limited edition pokemon go switch and like to keep it nice. I got this before my switch came and am glad of the purches I love the grip having small women hands made me worry it feel off. This was not it at all with out the case feels weird in hand held. This case is worth the money for sure a #1 must have for switch players in hand held mode. See it usefull for people with kids lets face it if we adults dont drop it they will.
customer_reviews.author: SugarRushAK

customer_reviews.title: Marks up switch
customer_reviews.text: Returned because it was marking up my switch during removal 2 stars because it was sturdy but I do dock my switch so needed something gentle to remove
customer_reviews.author: SciTeacher

customer_reviews.title: WOULD NOT RECOMMEND!
customer_reviews.text: I had it for only a few weeks and just from taking it on and off the switch, it cracked open the backplate on my switch and had to replace the backplate which is more difficult than I thought. Not to mention, you can’t even dock the switch with this on it and it doesn’t even make it that much more comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worried About Bulkyness
customer_reviews.text: So just got this case, and not going to lie I was a little worried of how bulky it was going to be. Obviously some people like that because it adds protection but for me I can of like how stylish the Switch looks on it's own. The case is awesome! Love it! Was not as bulky as it looks, feels great, has grip to it, and doesn't look half bad. The only con that I can think of, is that it doesn't fit in the dock (obviously). I wanted somewhere to place my Switch with the Mumba case on, so I bought the Hori HORI Compact Playstand. Fits nicely!
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: The switch and joy cons when connected snap securely right into this case
customer_reviews.text: A definite must have for a child’s Switch! The switch and joy cons when connected snap securely right into this case. Provides a nice additional rigidity to the unit. I recommend a screen protector as well to further assist the cases protection. Fairly easy to remove if desired to dock as it cannot be docked while case is on. To remove pop out each corner on the left and right. Unit can then be lifted out.
customer_reviews.author: Kreeyus

customer_reviews.title: Nice concept but need to be able to charge with case on.
customer_reviews.text: The idea is great but....I have to take the case of to charge it. If I want to continue to play I can not charge the device with the protection guard. What if I dropped it while have ti charge it. Will return if possible.
customer_reviews.author: Mamicandy

customer_reviews.title: perfect for my sons switch
customer_reviews.text: We got this case as an added level of protection for our 11 year old's switch. It works exactly like it should. The case is for when he is playing it as a hand-held. It is easy to take on and off. We haven't had any issues with it.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya M.

customer_reviews.title: Makes playing in portable mode infinitely more comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Purchased because my switch is used primarily in portable mode. Instantly felt a difference and my hands no longer cramp after 30 minutes thanks to the additional thickness the case adds. While I wouldn't suggest this as a protective case, the ergonomic improvement easily makes this a worthy purchase for the amazing price.
customer_reviews.author: Misty

customer_reviews.title: Good, comfortable protection.
customer_reviews.text: Just bought this case along with a glass screen protector and I am loving how comfortable it is. The comfort grips on the back really help with hand cramping and improve on the design of the switch for portable play. It is very easy to take off. While it won’t fit in the docking station while the case is on, I don’t find this to be a flaw. The design of this case is intended to be a bit bulkier to help with falls and to protect your Switch.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine A.

customer_reviews.title: It won't break your JoyCons!
customer_reviews.text: •Regarding some reviews talking about the case messing up JoyCons: The case comes with instructions that show you how to put on/remove the case. I kept the instructions for future reference and as long as you do it like the instructions show, you shouldn't have any issues. This case is AWESOME! Holding it without the case and then with the case on is a HUGE difference. It feels sturdier and if you have a death grip when playing (like I sometimes do) then you'll be put at ease knowing you won't snap off your JoyCons. Would DEFINITELY recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Tom V.

customer_reviews.title: All black looked nice
customer_reviews.text: Worked as described, made it a bit bulky but had no trouble playing the switch while using it handheld. I’m giving it 4 stars because it was a bit difficult to remove to place it on the holder/stand to project it on the TV instead in order to play or to put it to charge on the stand. It became a hassle after a while.
customer_reviews.author: darlene

customer_reviews.title: Not for women who wear makeup and game!
customer_reviews.text: Love this case, but one huge drawback is that it is not easy to wipe down and clean. I wear makeup and as terrible as it is I will touch my face when gaming. Real life face palms should t result in a filthy case that I can’t simply clean. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Phneyda D.

customer_reviews.title: It good
customer_reviews.text: Dropped my Switch like 15 feet and this case saved it. 100% worth. Maybe try the 5 game card version instead (has built-in cartridge holder in the back), but this is good for your money. I just slapped some velcro on the back, and bought some cheap game card holders to slap on it. It works great!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew R.

customer_reviews.title: Hard to install
customer_reviews.text: This product is good quality, but very hard to get the switch in and out of. My 8 year old can not do it buy himself. We are always sure to install or remove over a soft surface. It does require some muscle.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Putting the case on was super easy. Taking it off however required a little extra force. I got this case because I tend to just chuck my Switch in my bag and head off to class. Also, the switch alone without the case was too thin for my big hands, The case feels super solid and high quality. With the case on, there isn't any flex on the switch at all which makes me feel a little more secure. Just a little disappointed that it's not available in full black anymore. Overall, a great case.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Great shell
customer_reviews.text: Great shell for the switch. Makes it easier to hold. Taking it off takes a bit of getting used to just make sure to pop the top off first. Note this shell is larger than some and wont fit in some cases. Personally I bought it with the mumba case and it has enough room for everything I need.
customer_reviews.author: Jack and Sally

customer_reviews.title: Good for kids
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good case for if you drop your switch regularly. It’s a bit bulky and I don’t like the way it feels when I hold it to play. Good quality though and probably good for kids who drop their consoles often.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Alexis

customer_reviews.title: I honestly loved how this one felt in my hand but unfortunately ...
customer_reviews.text: I have both this one and the "slim" one. I honestly loved how this one felt in my hand but unfortunately when u lay it down on the back it doesn't protect the triggers. The slim one however does. So for me I plan on using this at work on my down time and would be constantly putting down on the desk when I'm done. The slim one fully protects it when u lay it down.
customer_reviews.author: xtreme

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and fit.
customer_reviews.text: Fits nintendo switch perfectly. Seems to protect well. Very durable and made well. Comfortable without feeling bulky. Still fits in carrying case without straining the zipper in any way. Bought a screen protector as well and the pair are doing a great job and our switch is in excellent condition.
customer_reviews.author: Staciii

customer_reviews.title: Good to have, but not really needed
customer_reviews.text: Overall the build quality and effectiveness of this protecting your switch is high, but it also comes with the cost of the increased weight which I found to be extremely uncomfortable. This product is great for traveling but since the case does not fit into the dock, you are likely going to be removing it often if you use your switch in docked mode.
customer_reviews.author: Seth

customer_reviews.title: Looks and feels great.
customer_reviews.text: Must have for the switch especially for how expensive they are. Accidents happen and this helps stop or reduce possible damage to unit. Bright color stands out so easy to locate or notice when walking or sitting around it.
customer_reviews.author: Luis R

customer_reviews.title: Overall Nice Case for Protection
customer_reviews.text: This case is pretty nice for the price. It’s nice and sturdy and the green is a really cool color for the kids. Our only complaint is that its really annoying to get the controls off. You have to take the case off to use the joy cons. We should have purchased a case that was more convenient for using the joy cons.
customer_reviews.author: FamilyFun

customer_reviews.title: Not thought out....bad design
customer_reviews.text: So it protects it while it’s on...buuuuut in order to charge it you have to take off the protector and doing this repeatedly you’ll damage your joy cons.. Bought it for protection against my nieces and nephews. Didn’t realize how destructive it could be till now. It gets two stars because it does make it easier to hold and protects.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

product_meta.title: Mumba Case for Nintendo Switch, [Heavy Duty] Slim Rubberized [Snap on] Hard Case Cover for Nintendo Switch 2017 release (Black)
product_meta.description: Color:BlackMaintain some serious damage control when you outfit your Nintendo Switch with this Heavy Duty Rugged Case by Mumba! This case is constructed of a hybrid combination of soft, shock-absorbent TPU and hard, damage-resistant Polycarbonate to protect against drops, falls, scratches and more. You can also expect an enhanced textured grip and responsive button covers, so start gaming and stop worrying – try this case out today!
feature_bullets: Grip case is constructed with flexible TPU to offer full protection all around the device and protect from everyday bumps, scratches, dust, and fingerprints
Ergonomically-designed grip case makes playing more comfortable
Enjoy easy access to all controls and functions without taking Nintendo Switch out of the grip case
Grip case is compatible with Mumba Carrying Case for Nintendo Switch (Sold separately on Amazon)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars1,197 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
